metadata.synopsis: The presence of a U.S. military base affects the lives of three troubled Korean teenagers (Yang Dong-kun, Kim Young-min).

reviews: An eheis tin ypomoni na parakoloythiseis gia miamisi ora tin poiitiki epanaliptikotita toy skinotheti poy einai asygkratitos oso pote sti mizeria poy petaei stoys iroes toy, mporei mesa ston aparadekto iho, ti ftini fotografia kai tin aneleita koyrastiki
A simple tale about Dog butchery, bullying, American imperialism and Korean bigotry.
